ResearchProjectDef.label: composite armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft composite armour plates for use in militaresque plate carriers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gunpowder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of muzzle-loading firearms via a smithy or machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: breech-loading
ResearchProjectDef.description: Significantly increase rate of fire by learning how to make breech-loading firearms at a smithy or machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: repeating actions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build more advanced, repeating firearms at a smithy or machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: optics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to manufacture magnified optics for rifles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: self-loading actions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create complex self-loading guns at a machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: magnetically assisted projectiles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Take advantage of magnetically assisted projectiles, designed for maximum speed and penetration. Allows you to build gauss weapons at a fabrication bench.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fuses
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make chemical and mechanical fuses for use in explosives. Allows the crafting of frag grenades and mortar shells at a smithy or machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: NNEMP
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use a non-nuclear electromagnetic pulse (NNEMP) to disable any electronic equipment within range. Construct EMP grenades and shells at a machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: grenade launchers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct glorified metal tubes at a machining table, to fire large explosives from.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smart munitions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to utilize some of the circuitry already found in EMP grenades to create a programmable "smart" grenade launcher.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solid rocket motors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Increase the effective range and speed of your warheads by seating them on solid rocket motors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: multibarrel weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to construct hand-cranked, multibarrel gatling guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brushless motors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using a brushless electric motor in combination with the gatling idea makes the dream of firing 6000 rounds per-minute a reality, in the form of the formidable Minigun.
